content.rendered:
Diploma in Graphics Design

Graphics Design course is very important for those who want to do career in Graphics Design. Many company needs Graphics Designer for creating their graphics works for Advertising, Presentation, Social Media Marketing, Brochures Design, Catalog Design and many other works.

Graphics Designer need in different industries like Advertising Company, I.T. Company, Web Design Company, Printing Media Company etc. so it has bright future and continuous requirement. You can also merge this course with Web Design Course and Digital Marketing Course.

Graphics Designing Course Contents:

Adobe Photoshop

Corel Draw

Adobe Illustrator

Adobe Photoshop:

  • Image / Photo Editing
  • Creating images
  • Vector Graphics
  • Pen Tool
  • Crop image
  • Layer Management
  • Layer Styles
  • Blending Option
  • Render and other Filter option
  • Logo Design
  • Layout Design

Corel Draw:

  • Creating Graphics
  • Color Management
  • Bending Effects
  • Gradient and Meshing
  • Text and its options
  • PowerClip Contents
  • Working with Layout
  • Bitmap and Effects
  • Import and Export Contents
  • Graphics Design, Logo Design

Adobe Illustraor:

  • Graphics in Illustraor
  • Creating Objects
  • Type Tool
  • Symbol and Library
  • Blending Effects
  • Import images
  • Export Documents
  • 3D Tools and effects
  • Creativity in Illustrator

Vmaxinfo Instituteoffer individual training for each course so students can join any time. All these courses can be done separately also. For more details visit to our office.
